title: Menus
text: This template is ready to use, so you don't need to change anything at a component level, unless you want to customize the default styling.

section.title: Customisability
section.content: You can choose between vegan and meat-based diets.

section.title: Variety
section.content: The menus change regularly so that you will have always something to discover

section.title: Sustainability
section.content: By having preordered meals we can keep food waste at minimal
